main event: A white, solid, circular object was sighted approximately 8 to 10 minutes after sunset over Ft. Jones, California.
interesting points: The object was approximately 2° to 3° in diameter and showed no color,The sighting was visual only and referred to as a UFO,The object's appearance was slightly below the horizon before it disappeared,There was no physical evidence found related to the sighting,The conclusion of the report suggested that the weather balloon theory is probable.
witness description: Mr. and Mrs. St. Mercer from Washington
